projectGridLines.title: Car As Gaming-station (CAG) - An ultimate destination for playing, connecting, and experiencing excitement  in your vehicle.
projectGridLines.description:
Description: CAG Racing is a platform that converts Vehicle as Entertainment Zone with in-Car Gaming and other

exiting features, etc., CAG Racing's in-car Gaming offers immersive gaming experience with full motion simulation,

allowing you to feel every turn, acceleration, and deceleration as if you were on the racetrack.

Skill sets: Major in Computer Science Engineering

? SW skills: Python, C#, C and good knowledge on HID (Human Interface Development) specification

? Hands on with USB and Bluetooth protocols

? Good knowledge on Firmware and Driver development

? Good knowledge on DirectX, Windows Driver Kit

Traits expectation: Willing to work in challenging and Agile Work environment.

Activities planned:

? Force Feedback integration for Sim. Racing games

? Integrating with other VR/AR application

o Destination rides

o Driving classes

? Optimizing performance for Sim. Racing games

o Optimizing the current Bluetooth controller library

o Understanding the HID-Controller development and adapting to our need


Expected learning:

? Hands on experience on System and Software Development, Integration and Validation processes.

? Hands on experience on New-age vehicle technologies and trends.

? Exposure towards Vehicle networks and Architecture

Specific courses required for project execution:

Software engineering, Computer Networks and Architecture, Operating Systems, Multi-device Programming
